managers

Class DocumentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • managers.DocumentManager

  • public class DocumentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Description: Class that communicates with the DocumentDB class as a proxy to pass information utilized in communicating with the database.
    Author:
    Tristen Kreutz

      DocumentManager()

        public boolean insert(Document doc)

        doc - Document to insert
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • update

        public boolean update(Document doc)
        Takes the Document object passed into the method and calls the update method of the DocumentDB, passing the Document.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document in the database to update
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String filePath)
        Takes the filePath String passed into the method and calls the delete method of the DocumentDB, passing the filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - filePath of the Document in the database to delete
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • get

        public Document get(java.lang.String filePath)
        Takes the filePath String passed into the method and calls the get method of the DocumentDB, passing the filePath.
        Parameters:
        filePath - filePath of the Document in the database to retrieve
        Returns:
        Document containing the information of the requested Document

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Document> getAll()
        Calls the getAll method of the DocumentDB.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all the Documents in the database
